messages.title: STRONGER ECONOMY. FAIRER SOCIETY.
messages.content: Dave Naghi and Jasper Gerard work hard together in East Ward

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Local Lib Dems have been fighting to mitigate Conservative Plans for over development in Maidstone and have been opposing attacks on the local economy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only by voting for David Naghi at the local election and Jasper Gerard at the General election on 7th May can you ensure you get the hardworking team in this area.

housing.content: The KIM and NEXT developments were approved against strong opposition but the plan for a massive Retail park on Newnham Court Farm was rejected.

leaflet.personalStatement: David Naghi has lived in Maidstone for 53 years. He has been a borough councillor for 13 years and a self-employed solicitor for 38 years.

images.caption: Dave and Jasper have been working together to help the people of East Ward on many issues.
